TextView.android:text: 'Lingua' is a Speech to text android application that links the text spoken in the app and the hardware. The application consists of two different types of systems ▪American Sign Language ▪Indian Sign Language The user has to choose between one of the two given options. Then according to the option, an activity opens that allows the user to speak and send data. The data in the application is sent by connecting via a bluetooth module which connects to the Arduino Development Board which directly links it with the robotic hand.
